TopicTitle: Your most embarrassing moment of the year so far?

Articles.Content:
What the title says. Feel free to share your most embarrassing moments of 2014 here. Don't worry. Most people won't judge you for it.

My most embarrassing moment of the year is when I was under my weird forum personality, which some of you hated. At first, I liked it, but then seeing the community's reaction to it made me switch back.

Er... I don't really remember what would be the most embarassing moment of the whole year, which is pretty embarassing itself.

But I think SirCmpwn finding my webpage would count.

Riding one of my motorcycles when it began to rain heavily. I had no helmet on and the rain hitting my face meant that I couldn't see. I had to stop. I rode the bike onto the sidewalk where I wanted to stop underneath a building to stay out of the rain. Little did I know that the sidewalk is extremely slippery when wet, and as I applied the front brake the front wheel instantly let go and I fell. There were many other people there also trying to stay dry and every single one of them saw me. That was pretty embarrassing.
I don't remember, and I don't want to remember. Write it off as a CIA coverup and leave it like that.
I have selective memory loss when it comes to embarrassments.

I have selective memory loss when it comes to embarrassments.

I see what you did there...
